motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • Approval of October 30, 2023, City Council Meeting Minutes • Resolution Appointing Members of the Urban Redevelopment Agency • Facility Usage Agreements with Athletic Association Partners • Contract Award for the Installation of a HVAC Control System at City Hall • Funding Authorization for 3900 Spalding Drive Storm Repairs • Funding Authorization for 1638 Kellogg Springs Drive Streambank Stabilization Engineering Services • Funding Authorization for 1341 Mill Gate Drive Storm Repairs

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to move into executive session for the purpose of legal and real estate discussion.
